fields.text: Which mode do you use in your main productivity app?
Which version of our new product slogan grabs your attention the most?
choices: Smarter, Simpler, Better – That's Our Promise
Power Your Day with Performance You Can Feel
Designed for You. Built for Life.

fields.text: Where would you most likely go when you feel seriously unwell and need medical help?
Which of the following messages is most persuasive for protecting your wealth during uncertain global market conditions?
choices: Preserve your legacy with multi-jurisdictional trust structures.
Secure global access to your assets with a Swiss private bank.
Shield your wealth with USD-denominated instruments in stable economies.
Navigate volatility with AI-powered portfolio rebalancing strategies.
Maintain liquidity through global real estate-backed credit lines.

fields.text: Which of the following statements best reflects your view on immigration reform?
choices: We should strengthen our borders and prioritize American jobs first.
Immigration reform should ensure a path to citizenship for law-abiding immigrants.
America benefits from immigrants, and we need a modern system to support legal immigration.
Illegal immigration threatens our economy and safety—we need stricter enforcement.

fields.text: If inflation stays above 6% for the next 12 months, which of the following actions are you most likely to take?
choices: Postpone major purchases (e.g. car, home appliances)
Switch to cheaper brands for regular purchases
Seek additional sources of income (e.g. gig work, part-time job)
Invest in inflation-protected assets (e.g. gold, real estate)
Make no significant changes to spending habits

fields.text: Which of these slogans sounds the most inclusive and respectful?
choices: For hardworking men and women everywhere
Built for the bold and brave

fields.text: Which version of the fee disclosure is easier to understand?
choices: We charge a 1% annual management fee based on your portfolio balance.
Each year, you pay $10 for every $1,000 in your account.

fields.text: Which news source would you rely on more for political information?
Which beverage would you prefer to stay productive at work?
Which guild would you trust to guard the Vault of Echoes?
Which of the following do you believe is the primary driver of climate change?
choices: Human industrial activity and fossil fuels
I don't believe human activity caused climate change
